Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's involvement with a circus, his initial performance, the disruption caused by Matto Grasso, and Paul's heroic actions and eventual departure.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Debut and Ominous News
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and another character who hears about the circus's arrival, setting the stage for events at the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces conflict as a man investigates a disturbance at the circus and confronts Billings, leading to a violent encounter.

sub_scenes.title: Owner's Plea and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves the circus owner explaining the situation to the man in the checkered shirt and offering him a job as the new strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Revenge and Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Matto Grasso's plot for revenge against Paul Bunyan and the circus, and Paul's heroic actions to thwart Grasso's plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Chaos and the Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Grasso's second revenge plot using an ape, leading to chaos and a chase after Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ape's Release and the Keeper's Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Arena Obstruction and Continued Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves the chase into the arena, with attempts to obstruct Grasso's escape using a barbell.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Defeat and Trapeze Stunt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Sonny confronting and defeating Grasso, leading to a dramatic trapeze toss.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Bunyan's Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the circus conflict with Grasso apprehended, a job offer for Paul, and Paul's decision to return to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Tale
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Marco Polo's encounter with the supernatural in Tibet, involving a talking head, a mysterious city, and a dangerous ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and the Talking Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet and his bizarre encounter with a severed, talking head.

narrative_arcs.title: The Talking Head's Gratitude and Guidance

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun's Mourning and Ogress's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene leads Marco Polo to Hi-toun and then to a suspicious castle, setting up a dangerous encounter.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Mourning Hi-toun and Offers Assistance
Encounter with the Distressed Woman and the Suspicious Castle
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Unmasking the Ogress
Confrontation with the Ogress and Her Tusked Mice

Major_Arcs.title: The Swordsman's Capture by Snakes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a brief interlude depicting a swordsman's fight and capture using snakes by a cloaked figure.

sub_scenes.title: Cloaked Figure and Snake Restraint
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a swordsman's attempt to fight a cloaked figure and his subsequent capture using snakes.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus and the Ogre's Demise
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Princess Lotus's captivity by an ogre and her eventual escape with the help of another prisoner and a magic knife.

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Captivity and Weapon of Hope
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Princess Lotus and another young man held captive by an ogre, with a glimmer of hope appearing with the discovery of a knife.

narrative_arcs.title: Despair and Discovery of a Weapon

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Reunion, and Farewell Gift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the escape from the ogre's dungeon, reunion with the princess's father, and the young man's departure after refusing a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Reunion, and Refused Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Captain Brooking - A Tale of Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a cautionary tale about treasure, betrayal, and revenge, centered around Captain Brooking and Officer Jordan.

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Bargain in Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the story with a narrator and then shifts to a penal colony where a prisoner proposes a deal involving hidden treasure to Captain Brooking.

narrative_arcs.title: Map Exchange and Promise of Freedom

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Imprisonment, and Revenge Vow
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal, Jordan's imprisonment, and his subsequent release with a burning desire for revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Vigil and Confrontation with Brooking
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's patient wait for Brooking and their eventual confrontation, leading to a midnight meeting.

sub_scenes.title: Attic Betrayal and Violent End
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Brooking leading Jordan to the attic and then violently betraying and killing him for the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Claim of Victory

sub_scenes.title: Police Intervention and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the police responding to the gunshot, the murderer's failed escape, and a narrator's moral conclusion about money.

narrative_arcs.title: Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, dealing with a vengeful ghost and uncovering past hatred.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and Matthews Case
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the case of the haunted Matthews estate, setting up a supernatural investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor and the Supernatural Expert Discuss the Matthews Estate

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at the Haunted Estate and Ghostly Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dr. Styx's arrival at the Matthews estate, encountering warnings and then the ghost of Vincent Matthews himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Place
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House
Confrontation with the Ghostly Figure Inside the House
Unwavering Confrontation and Declaration of Intent

sub_scenes.title: Fight with the Ghost and Path to Salvation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dr. Styx's physical fight with the ghost and the revelation of the ghost's need for forgiveness from his murdered sister.

narrative_arcs.title: Desperate Struggle and Reversal of Fortune
Questioning Violence, Fear, and the Path to Salvation
The Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Fate

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind's Summons, Forgiveness, and Brotherly Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dr. Styx forcing the ghost to confront Rosalind, leading to forgiveness and brotherly love that frees the ghost.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Voyages and Tragic End
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's voyages to find the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his mysterious disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: Dutch East India Company Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson and the mission assigned by the Dutch East India Company to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Last Voyage
The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Voyage Discontent and Hudson River Exploration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the rising tension among the crew during the voyage and their exploration of the Hudson River with initial hope and eventual disillusionment.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Disillusionment and the Decision to Turn Back

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Ice Trap, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene recounts Hudson's second voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice, and the eventual mutiny by the crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Growing Despair
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Challenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the Arabian Knight, Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartars, facing trials of combat and romance.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hassan and the Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan, the Arabian Knight, and his mission to rescue Ali-Ben-Ali's daughter from the Tartars, as assigned by the Caliph.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Introduction and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Traveler's Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey to the Tartar camp, including reaching a deserted oasis and encountering a traveler who warns him of danger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Journey to the Oasis of El-Sholem
Deserted Oasis and Discovery of Tartar Trail
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offer of Water and Doubt on the Mission

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture at Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan infiltrating the Tartar camp, making contact with the prisoner, but then getting discovered and captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Kurgan's Honor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up and depicts Hassan's trial by combat, proposed by Kurgan, for the woman's freedom.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution, Reward Kiss, and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Arabian Knight's arc with Kurgan honoring his word, the woman clarifying the kiss, and a final, romantic kiss before they part.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan Keeps His Word and Bids Farewell
Woman Explains the Kiss and Praises Hassan
